interface.name: treeland_app_id_resolver_manager_v1
interface.description: Create a resolver object. Typically exactly one privileged helper (a Wayland client with DBus access) binds this interface and serves identify requests coming from the compositor.

interface.name: treeland_app_id_resolver_v1
interface.description: The compositor sends identify_request with a unique request_id and a pidfd. The client must answer exactly once via respond(request_id, app_id). If resolution fails respond with an empty string.

description.summary: ask client to resolve pidfd to application id
respond with app id (empty on failure)
